DESCRIPTION: Orb: Adds #yGrowing #yPain each turn and deals damage to a random enemy. When #yEvoked [REMOVE_SPACE], removes all #yGrowing #yPain from the player and deals that much damage to ALL enemies.
Whenever you fully block damage, increases by 1. When it reaches 10 or more, immediately remove #yGrowing #yPain [REMOVE_SPACE], deal 10 damage to EVERYONE, and gain 1 #yStrength [REMOVE_SPACE].
